00068                 private function generate_error($code)
00069                 {
00070                         $desc = self::$descriptions[$code];
00071                         header("HTTP/1.0 $code $desc");
00072                         if (isset($_SESSION['error_processed']))
00073                         {
00074                                 unset($_SESSION['error_processed']);
00075                                 return;
00076                         }
00077                         if ($code == 404)
00078                         {
00079                                 return;
00080                         }
00081                         $error = new ServerError(array('code' => $code,
00082                                 'description' => var_export($_SERVER, TRUE),
00083                                 'occurred_at' => date('Y-m-d H:i:s')));
00084                         $error->save();
00085                 }
00086         }
